  • Method Details

    • send

      private void send(Message message)
      Sends a message to the client through the output stream. This method synchronizes access to the output stream to ensure thread safety.
      Parameters:
      message - the Message object to be sent to the client.

    • run

      public void run()
      Handles incoming messages from a client through an input stream and processes them based on their type. This method continuously listens for messages as long as the associated socket remains open.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • setGame

      public void setGame(Game game)
      Updates the game state for the client by sending the provided game object through a message to the client.
      Specified by:
      setGame in interface VirtualClient
      Parameters:
      game - the Game object representing the current state of the game to be sent to the client.

    • addLogs

      public void addLogs(List<String> logs)
      Sends a list of log messages to the client. The log messages are sent as a payload within a message with the type "LOG".
      Specified by:
      addLogs in interface VirtualClient
      Parameters:
      logs - the list of log messages to be sent to the client.

    • sendJoinableGames

      public void sendJoinableGames(List<Game.GameInfo> gameInfos)
      Sends a list of joinable games to the client. This method constructs a message of type "JOINABLE-GAMES" containing the list of game information and sends it through the output stream.
      Specified by:
      sendJoinableGames in interface VirtualClient
      Parameters:
      gameInfos - the list of Game.GameInfo objects representing the available games that the client can join.
